name: memkvstore
description: MemStoreKv is a key-value store class implemented in TypeScript. It supports a variety of advanced features, including time-to-live (TTL) for keys, secondary indexing, write-ahead logging (WAL), multi-node consensus, data partitioning, data compression and encryption, versioning and conflict resolution, batch operations and atomic transactions, event sourcing and CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation), snapshots, and partitioning.
author: Alexa Matei
